'''''The Secret of Blue Water''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must complete {{Quest|Secret Keepers and Forbidden Zones}}.

== Trivia ==

* This achievement's name is a reference to ''{{W|Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water}}'', an anime created by {{W|Hideaki Anno}} and {{W|Hayao Miyazaki}} that aired in the 1990s.
